lead_paragraph: Rob Segedin swung his way into the Los Angeles Dodgers' record book a year after he was ready to walk away from the game entirely.

headline.print_headline: Segedin Has Dodger-Record 4 RBIs in ML Debut vs Red Sox
headline.main: Segedin Has Dodger-Record 4 RBIs in ML Debut vs Red Sox
